grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 養豚【ヨウトン】pig-keeping, pig farming
焼きとん【ヤキトン】yakiton, grilled pork on skewers
kun reading compounds: 豚【ぶた】pig (Sus scrofa domesticus), pork, fatso, fatty
萌え豚【もえぶた】anime freak, person overly interested in female anime and video game characters
塩豚【しおぶた】salted pork, ham
